questions.question: জোড়াসাঁকোর 'ঠাকুর' পরিবারের আসল পদবি ছিল-
questions.explanation: জোড়াসাঁকোর ঠাকুর পরিবারের আসল পদবি ছিল 'কুশারী'। উল্লেখ্য, রবীন্দ্রনাথ ঠাকুরের পূর্বপুরুষের আদি নিবাস খুলনার পিঠাভোগ ও দক্ষিণডিহি অঞ্চল।

questions.question: 'তরী তার এসেছে কি? বেজেছে কি আগমনী গান? ডেকেছে কি সে আমারে? শুনি নাই, রাখি নি সন্ধান।' উক্তিটি কোন লেখার অর্ন্তগত?
questions.explanation: সুফিয়া কামালের সংলাপনির্ভর কবিতা 'তাহারেই পড়ে মনে' কবিতার অংশবিশেষ: • বাতাবি নেবুর ফুল ফুটেছে কি? ফুটেছে কি আমের মুকুল?/দখিনা সমীর তার গন্ধে গন্ধে হয়েছে কি অধীর আকুল? • আমারে গাহিতে গান, বসন্তেরে আনিতে বরিয়া-/রহেনি, সে ভুলেনি তো, এসেছে তা ফাগুনে স্মরিয়া।

questions.question: কোন বানানটি ভুল?
questions.explanation: 'নিক্কণ' শব্দটির শুদ্ধ রূপ 'নিক্বণ'। বানান সতকর্তা চাণক্য, মাণিক্য, কঙ্কণ, কণিকা, শোণিত, বিপণি, গণিকা, পাণি (হাত), বণিক, পিণাক।

questions.question: 'সওগাত' শব্দের অর্থ কী?
'কাপুড়ে বাবু' বাগধারার অর্থ কী?
questions.explanation: গুরুত্বপূর্ণ বাগধারাঃ ফেকলু পার্টি (কদরহীন লোক), বাঘের মাসি (নির্ভীক), বিষবৃক্ষ (অনিষ্টকারী), মামদোবাজি (প্রতারণা)।

questions.question: 'যে ভবিষ্যৎ না ভেবে কাজ করে' এর সঠিক এক কথায় প্রকাশ কোনটি?
questions.explanation: এককথায় প্রকাশ : যে বিষয়ে কোনো বিতর্ক নেই-অবিসংবাদী। যা অতি দীর্ঘ নয়-নাতিদীর্ঘ। যা বলার যোগ্য নয়-অকথ্য। যার সর্বস্ব হারিয়ে গেছে-সর্বহারা, হৃতসর্বস্ব।

questions.question: নিচের কোনটি 'নিপাতনে সিদ্ধ' সমাসের উদাহরণ?
questions.explanation: সমাস নির্ণয়: প্রদত্ত শব্দ ব্যাসবাক্য সমাসের নাম পণ্ডিতমূর্খ পণ্ডিত হয়েও যে মূর্খ নিপাতনে সিদ্ধ বহুব্রীহি খোশমেজাজ খোশ মেজাজ যার সমানাধিকরণ বহুব্রীহি কানেখাটো কানে খাটো যে অলুক বহুব্রীহি বেপরোয়া নেই পরোয়া (ভয়) যার নঞ বহুব্রীহি

questions.question: 'অচিন' শব্দের 'অ' উপসর্গটি কোন অর্থে ব্যবহৃত হয়?
questions.explanation: উপসর্গ যে অর্থে ব্যবহৃত উদাহরণ অ (বাংলা) অভাব/না/নর্থক অচিন, অমিল, অথৈ।

questions.question: 'কলম' শব্দটি কোন ভাষার শব্দ?
'শিক্ষক ছাত্রদের ব্যাকরণ পড়াচ্ছেন' বাক্যটি কোন কারকের উদাহরণ?
questions.explanation: মূল কর্তা যখন অন্যকে কোনো কাজে নিয়োজিত করে তা সম্পন্ন করায়, তখন তাকে প্রযোজক কর্তা বলে। যেমন শিক্ষক ছাত্রদের ব্যাকরণ পড়াচ্ছেন। এখানে 'শিক্ষক' প্রযোজক কর্তা।

questions.question: Which country co-hosted the WTO's 12th Ministerial Conference (MC12) in 2022?
questions.explanation: The conference was co-hosted by Kazakhstan and chaired by Mr. Timur Suleimenov.

questions.question: Who is the CEO of Microsoft?
questions.explanation: Jeff Bezos Executive Chairman of Amazon Satya Nadella CEO of Microsoft Ramon Laguarta CEO of Pepsi Co Tim Cook CEO of Apple

questions.question: Which MFS provider is the current market leader of that sector in Bangladesh?
questions.explanation: At present Bkash has 48% of market share whereas Nagad and DBBL-Rocket with 28% and 21% of shares.

questions.question: Which company sponsored the Bangladesh-West Indies Padma Bridge Dream Fulfilled Friendship Test Series?
questions.explanation: Walton Sponsored this Bangladesh-West Indies Padma Bridge Dream Fulfilled Friendship Test Series.

questions.question: Which company has acquired majority shares of Sanofi Bangladesh?
questions.explanation: Beximco Pharma. Ltd one of the leading drug maker, acquire 54.6% stake of sonofi Bangladesh.

questions.question: What is the size of the national budget for the FY 2022- 2023 passed in the parliament?
questions.explanation: On June 30, 2022 Bangladesh passed budget for FY 2022-23 of 678064 crore taka.

questions.question: Which of the following 'is the first country. to' become a member of the New Development Bank despite being outside the BRICS?
questions.explanation: Bangladesh is the first country to become a member of the bank despite being outside the BRICS since its establishment in 2015.

questions.question: Which sector has the highest contribution to the GDP of Bangladesh?
questions.explanation: Service sector has the highest contribution to the GDP of Bangladesh and industry contributes the second highest.

questions.question: BGMEA stands for-

options.label: ক
options.text: Bangladesh Garment Merchandisers and Exporters Association

options.label: খ
options.text: Bangladesh Garment Managers and Employees Association

options.label: গ
options.text: Bangladesh Garment Manufacturers and Exporters Association

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Bangladesh Garment Machineries and Exporters Association

questions.option_a: Bangladesh Garment Merchandisers and Exporters Association
questions.option_b: Bangladesh Garment Managers and Employees Association
questions.option_c: Bangladesh Garment Manufacturers and Exporters Association
questions.option_d: Bangladesh Garment Machineries and Exporters Association
questions.explanation: BGMEA: Bangladesh Garment Manufacturers and Exporters Association

questions.question: Which of the following is the first country in the world to officially classify Bitcoin as legal currency?
questions.explanation: Bitcoin is a decentralized digital currency created by Satoshi Nakamoto, first use as a legal currency in El Salvador.

questions.question: What is the name of the Mascot of football world cup 2022?
questions.explanation: World Cup Mascot Name Brazil 2014 Fuleco Russia 2018 Zabivaka Qatar 2022 Laeeb

questions.question: How many LEED-certified RMG factories (green factories) are there in-Bangladesh at present?
questions.explanation: LEED certification is a rating system that review a factory's green initiatives. Over 270 LEED-certified RMG factories in Bangladesh.

questions.question: The Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) are targeted to fulfill by the year:
questions.explanation: SDGs are collection of 17 goals developed by UN, targeted by fulfill by 2030.

questions.question: Which of the following organizations is the, regulator of the country's capital market?
questions.explanation: Market Regulator Capital BSEC Money Bangladesh Bank

questions.question: Which of the following is not a member country of NATO?
questions.explanation: SWEDEN is a Scandenevian Country.

questions.question: To get cheap pencils, buy them ____ the gross.
questions.explanation: By the gross এর অর্থ সংখ্যায় বা পরিমাণে অনেক (in large numbers or amounts)। বাক্যটির বাংলা অর্থ: অল্প দামে পেনসিল কিনতে চাইলে একসাথে অনেকগুলো কিনতে হবে।

questions.question: The peasant refused to grovel ___ the feet of his master.
questions.explanation: Grovel at কারও কাছে দয়া ভিক্ষা চাওয়া/ নিজেকে ছোট করা।

questions.question: Select the correctly spelled word:
questions.explanation: সঠিক বানান- adventitious যার অর্থ দৈবাগত, দৈবিক।

questions.question: Select the correctly spelled word:
questions.explanation: সঠিক বানান acquiesce যার অর্থ- স্বীকার করা।

questions.question: Select the correctly spelled word:
questions.explanation: সঠিক বানান- bureaucracy যার অর্থ আমলাতন্ত্র বা আমলাদের দ্বারা পরিচালিত শাসন ব্যবস্থা।

questions.question: Which of the following sentences is correct?

options.label: ক
options.text: Come back in an hour time.

options.label: খ
options.text: Come back in one hour about.

options.label: গ
options.text: Come back in about one hour time.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Come back in an hour's time.

questions.option_a: Come back in an hour time.
questions.option_b: Come back in one hour about.
questions.option_c: Come back in about one hour time.
questions.option_d: Come back in an hour's time.
questions.explanation: Come back in an hour time- এক ঘন্টা সময়ের মধ্যে ফিরে আসবে।

questions.question: Which of the following sentences is correct?

options.label: ক
options.text: People, who talk loudly on their cell phones in crowded trains, show little respect for other passengers.

options.label: খ
options.text: People, who talk loudly on their cell phone in crowded trains, show little respect for other passengers.

options.label: গ
options.text: People who talk loudly on their cell phones in crowded trains show little respect for other passengers.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: People, who talk loudly, on their cell phone in crowded trains show little respect for other passengers.

questions.option_a: People, who talk loudly on their cell phones in crowded trains, show little respect for other passengers.
questions.option_b: People, who talk loudly on their cell phone in crowded trains, show little respect for other passengers.
questions.option_c: People who talk loudly on their cell phones in crowded trains show little respect for other passengers.
questions.option_d: People, who talk loudly, on their cell phone in crowded trains show little respect for other passengers.
questions.explanation: Punctuation এর নিয়মানুযায়ী, বাক্যের মধ্যের dependent clause-টি দুইপাশে কমা (,) দ্বারা আবদ্ধ থাকবে এবং cell phones হবে যেহেতু people, plural noun.

questions.question: The word 'PRECIPITOUS' is similar to:
questions.explanation: Precipitous শব্দের অর্থ অত্যন্ত খাড়া (very steep)।

questions.question: The word 'CONGREGATE' is similar to:
questions.explanation: Congregate শব্দের অর্থ একত্র করা, জড় করা। এর কয়েকটি সমার্থক শব্দ: gather, collect, assemble, amass, crowd ইত্যাদি।

questions.question: The word 'QUIESCENT' is opposite to:
questions.explanation: Quiescent শব্দের অর্থ শান্ত, নিশ্চল। এর বিপরীত শব্দ active (সচল)।

questions.question: The word 'APPROBATE' is opposite to:
questions.explanation: Correct Answer: গ — condemn ✅ Explanation: Approbate = to approve, endorse, or praise The opposite meaning = condemn Other options: ক — ingratitude ❌ → unrelated খ — dissatisfaction ❌ → unrelated ঘ — master ❌ → unrelated Answer: গ

questions.question: Although he never learnt to read, his exceptional memory and enquiring mind eventually made him a very ——- man.
questions.explanation: Dedicated- নিবেদিত; pragmatic- বাস্তববাদী; erudite- বিদ্বান; benevolent- দয়ালু। Although দ্বারা দুটি বিপরীত idea প্রকাশ করা হয়। অর্থাৎ, যদিও সে বেশি পড়তে পারেনি, তথাপি তাঁর প্রখর মেধা এবং অতি উৎসাহী মন তাঁকে একজন বিদ্বান হিসেবে গড়ে তুলেছে। সুতরাং Option C সঠিক।

questions.question: Membership in the United Nations is open to all nations ___ in the United Nations Charter.

options.label: ক
options.text: who agree to abide by the conditions

options.label: খ
options.text: that agree to abide by the conditions

questions.option_a: who agree to abide by the conditions
questions.option_b: that agree to abide by the conditions
questions.explanation: Nations এর modifier হিসেবে who বসবে। Abide by- মেনে চলা।

questions.question: The Paralympics is competition for the ___.
questions.explanation: Paralympics-প্রতিবন্ধী বা disabled দের জন্য আন্তর্জাতিকভাবে আয়োজিত ক্রীড়া প্রতিযোগিতা।

questions.question: The analogous pair of - MONK: DEVOTION is:
questions.explanation: Monk বা সন্ন্যাসীদের মধ্যে যেমন ধর্মের প্রতি গভীর অনুরক্তি বা ভক্তি (devotion) থাকে, তেমনি rover বা ভ্রমনকারীদের মধ্যে ভ্রমনের প্রতি তীব্র আকাঙ্ক্ষা (wanderlust) থাকে।

questions.question: The analogous pair of-BURGLAR : STEAL is:
questions.explanation: Burglar (সিঁদেল চোর) এর কাজ চুরি করা (steal); তেমনি, arbitrator (মধ্যস্থতাকারী) এর কাজ বিচার করা (judge)।

questions.question: I am rather busy. The underlined word is a/an:
questions.explanation: Rather এই বাক্যে সম্পূর্ণ বা quite এর অর্থ-দিচ্ছে এবং এটা busy (adjective) কে modify করার rather, adverb হিসেবে বসেছে। বাক্যটির বাংলা অর্থ: আমি সম্পূর্ণ ব্যস্ত।

questions.question: He said, "Ugh! I have hated" it. The indirect form of the speech is:

options.label: ক
options.text: He exclaimed with disgust that he had been hated it.

options.label: খ
options.text: He exclaimed with disgust that he had hated it.

options.label: গ
options.text: He exclaimed with sorrow that he had hated it.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: He exclaimed with disgust that I had hated it.

questions.option_a: He exclaimed with disgust that he had been hated it.
questions.option_b: He exclaimed with disgust that he had hated it.
questions.option_c: He exclaimed with sorrow that he had hated it.
questions.option_d: He exclaimed with disgust that I had hated it.
questions.explanation: 'Ugh' দ্বারা বিরক্তি বোঝাচ্ছে তাই indirect speech এ exclaimed with disgust হবে এবং I পরিবর্তিত হয়ে he হবে। Reporting verb past হওয়ায় reported speechও past indefinite tense এ হবে।

questions.question: The new student asked the old one, "Do you know my name?" The indirect form of the speech is:

options.label: ক
options.text: The new student asked the old one did he know his name

options.label: খ
options.text: The new student asked the old one If he knows his name

options.label: গ
options.text: The new student asked the old one that whether he knew his name.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: The new student asked the old one if he knew his name.

questions.option_a: The new student asked the old one did he know his name
questions.option_b: The new student asked the old one If he knows his name
questions.option_c: The new student asked the old one that whether he knew his name.
questions.option_d: The new student asked the old one if he knew his name.
questions.explanation: Interrogative questions এর indirect speech এ inverted comma এর পরিবর্তে if/whether আসবে এবং reported speech simple past (he knew) হবে।

questions.question: "Buy one shirt and get one free" The complex form of the sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: If you buy one shirt, you get another shirt free.

options.label: খ
options.text: If you buy one shirt, you get one free.

options.label: গ
options.text: Buy one shirt to get one free.

questions.option_a: If you buy one shirt, you get another shirt free.
questions.option_b: If you buy one shirt, you get one free.
questions.option_c: Buy one shirt to get one free.
questions.explanation: একটি জামা কিনলে, একটি ফ্রি পাওয়া যাবে অর্থাৎ, simple sentence-টি শর্ত প্রকাশ করছে। শর্ত বা নির্ভরশীলতা প্রকাশ complex sentence এ if হয়। উল্লেখ্য, one দ্বারা shirt বোঝাচ্ছে, আবার another shirt ও সঠিক expression। সুতরাং Option A & B দুইটিই correct।

questions.question: "How gorgeous is the sunset!" The assertive form of the sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: How is the sunset so gorgeous?

options.label: খ
options.text: The sunset is gorgeous, isn't it?

questions.option_a: How is the sunset so gorgeous?
questions.option_b: The sunset is gorgeous, isn't it?
questions.explanation: Exclamatory sentence এ how থাকলে assertive করার সময় adjective এর পূর্বে very বসে। Structure: subject + verb + very + adjective.

questions.question: "Please shut the door and go to sleep" The passive form of this sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: The door is to be shut and you are to go to sleep.

options.label: খ
options.text: Let the door to be shut and you be asleep.

options.label: গ
options.text: You are requested to shut the door and go to sleep.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: The door is to be shut and you are requested to sleep.

questions.option_a: The door is to be shut and you are to go to sleep.
questions.option_b: Let the door to be shut and you be asleep.
questions.option_c: You are requested to shut the door and go to sleep.
questions.option_d: The door is to be shut and you are requested to sleep.
questions.explanation: Imperative sentence এ please (অনুরোধ) থাকলে passive করার সময় you are requested + to + বাকি অংশ।

questions.question: "I was obliged to go" The active form of this sentence is:

options.label: ঘ
options.text: It was my obligation to go.

questions.option_d: It was my obligation to go.
questions.explanation: সে যেতে বাধ্য হয়েছিল অর্থাৎ, কোনোকিছু তাকে যেতে বাধ্য করেছিল। সুতরাং active sentence এ subject circumstances এবং বাক্যটি simple past এ হবে।

questions.question: The old Neem tree which ___ in our compound for fifty years suddenly crashed to the ground last night.
questions.explanation: অতীতে For + period of time থাকলে সেটা past perfect continuous tense এ হয়।

questions.question: I ___ a letter when he came to my house.
questions.explanation: When বা while দ্বারা দুটি clause যুক্ত হলে একটি past continuous এবং অপরটি simple past এ হবে।

questions.question: Identify the incorrect one from the underlined sections: Electrical disturbances on earth are frequently caused with storms on the surface of the sun.
questions.explanation: Are frequently caused by storms হবে।

questions.question: Identify the incorrect one from the underlined sections: Average world temperatures have risen on half of a degree Celsius since the mid-nineteenth century.
questions.explanation: Rise অর্থ অধিক পরিমাণে বৃদ্ধি পাওয়া। এর সাথে preposition by হবে।

questions.question: Answer the next three questions based on the following passage. Improving your communication skills may be the single most important step you can take in your career. You can have the greatest ideas in the world, but they are worthless unless you can express them to your company or your career if you can't express them clearly and persuasively. Some jobs, such as sales and customer support, are primarily about communicating. In fields such as engineering or finance, you often need to share complex ideas with executives, customers, colleagues, and your ability to connect with people outside your field can be as important as your technical expertise. If you have the entrepreneurial urge, you will need to communicate with a wide range of audiences, from investors, bankers, and government regulators to employees, customers, and business partners. As you take on leadership and management roles, communication becomes even more important. The higher you rise in an organization, the less time you will spend using the technical skills of your particular profession and the more time you will spend communicating. 28.1. The passage describes:

options.label: ক
options.text: The ways of gathering efficiency in communication.

options.label: খ
options.text: Importance of communication in social life.

questions.option_a: The ways of gathering efficiency in communication.
questions.option_b: Importance of communication in social life.
questions.explanation: প্রদত্ত passage-টিতে career-এর ক্ষেত্রে communication skills অর্থাৎ যোগাযোগের দক্ষতা কতটা গুরুত্ব বহন করে তা তুলে ধরা হয়েছে।

questions.question: a, b, and c are positive integers. If a, b, and c are assembled into the six-digit number abcabc, which one of the following must be a factor of abcabc?
questions.explanation: We can sure that abcabc will get divisible by abc ∴ a b c a b c a b c = 123123 123 = 1001 \therefore \frac{a b c a b c}{a b c}=\frac{123123}{123}=1001 ∴ ab c ab c ab c ​ = 123 123123 ​ = 1001 what are factors of 1001 = 7 × 11 × 13 1001=7 \times 11 \times 13 1001 = 7 × 11 × 13 Thus in given choice 13 is correct

questions.question: Find the x x x -intercept of y = − 2 3 x + 4 y=-\frac{2}{3} x+4 y = − 3 2 ​ x + 4 .
questions.explanation: x intercept we get y = 0 \mathrm{y}=0 y = 0 ∴ y = − 2 3 x + 4 ⇒ 0 = − 2 3 x + 4 ⇒ − 2 x + 12 = 0 ∴ x = 6 \therefore y=-\frac{2}{3} x+4 \Rightarrow 0=-\frac{2}{3} x+4 \Rightarrow-2 x+12=0 \quad \therefore x=6 ∴ y = − 3 2 ​ x + 4 ⇒ 0 = − 3 2 ​ x + 4 ⇒ − 2 x + 12 = 0 ∴ x = 6

questions.question: Out of 30 students of a class 20 like football, 15 like cricket Number of students who like both the games is 10. Determine the number of students who do not like either of the games.
questions.explanation: n ( S ) = 30 , n ( F ) = 20 , n ( C ) = 15 , n ( F ∩ C ) = 10 n ( F ∪ C ) = n ( F ) + n ( C ) − n ( F ∩ C ) = 20 + 15 − 10 = 25 ∴ n ( F ∪ C ) ′ = n ( S ) − n ( F ∪ C ) = 30 − 25 = 5 \begin{array}{l} n(S)=30, n(F)=20, n(C)=15, n(F \cap C)=10 \\ \mathrm{n}(\mathrm{F} \cup \mathrm{C})=\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{F})+\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{C})-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{F} \cap \mathrm{C}) \\ =20+15-10=25 \\ \therefore \mathrm{n}(\mathrm{F} \cup \mathrm{C})^{\prime}=\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{S})-\mathrm{n}(\mathrm{F} \cup \mathrm{C})=30-25=5\end{array} n ( S ) = 30 , n ( F ) = 20 , n ( C ) = 15 , n ( F ∩ C ) = 10 n ( F ∪ C ) = n ( F ) + n ( C ) − n ( F ∩ C ) = 20 + 15 − 10 = 25 ∴ n ( F ∪ C ) ′ = n ( S ) − n ( F ∪ C ) = 30 − 25 = 5 ​

questions.question: What is the value of the quotient 6 × 10 5 2 × 10 − 2 \frac{6 \times 10^{5}}{2 \times 10^{-2}} 2 × 1 0 − 2 6 × 1 0 5 ​ ?
Find the characteristic (94) of log of 0.000435
What is the difference in perimeter between a square with a base of 4 feet and a circle with a diameter of 4 feet?
questions.explanation: Difference in perimeter = 4 × 4 − 4 π f t = 16 − 4 π f t =4 \times 4-4 \pi \mathrm{ft}=16-4 \pi \mathrm{ft} = 4 × 4 − 4 π ft = 16 − 4 π ft

questions.question: The length of a rectangle is twice of its width. If its area is 512 sq m, what is the perimeter?
questions.explanation: Let the width of a rectangle be = x and the length of a rectangle = 2 x =2 x = 2 x According to the question, 2 x × x = 512 ⇒ x 2 = 256 ∴ x = 16  Perimeter  = 2 ( 2 x + x ) = 6 x = 6 × 16 = 96 \begin{array}{l} 2 x \times x=512 \Rightarrow x^{2}=256 \therefore x=16 \\ \text { Perimeter }=2(2 x+x)=6 x=6 \times 16=96 \end{array} 2 x × x = 512 ⇒ x 2 = 256 ∴ x = 16  Perimeter  = 2 ( 2 x + x ) = 6 x = 6 × 16 = 96 ​

questions.question: A wire from the top of a 25-foot flagpole is attached to a point 20 feet from the base of the flagpole. To the nearest whole number, find the length of the wire.
questions.explanation: Let, the length of the wire b e = A C = x f t \mathrm{be}=\mathrm{AC}=\mathrm{x} f t be = AC = x f t In A B C A B C A BC triangle we get, A C 2 = B C 2 + A B 2 ⇒ x 2 = 20 2 + 25 2 ⇒ x = 400 + 625 = 32 f t \begin{array}{l} \mathrm{AC}^{2}=\mathrm{BC}^{2}+\mathrm{AB}^{2} \\ \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}^{2}=20^{2}+25^{2} \\ \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=\sqrt{400+625}=32 \mathrm{ft} \end{array} AC 2 = BC 2 + AB 2 ⇒ x 2 = 2 0 2 + 2 5 2 ⇒ x = 400 + 625 ​ = 32 ft ​

questions.question: In a right angle triangle, what is the value of the angle opposite to hypotenuse?
questions.explanation: The hypotenuse of a right triangle is always the side opposite the right angle or 90 ∘ 90^{\circ} 9 0 ∘

questions.question: An $80.00 coat is marked down 20%. It does not sell, so the shop owner marks it down an additional 15%. What is the new price of the coat?
questions.explanation: First find the new price at per 20% marked down = $(80 × 0.80) = $ 64 Then find the price with 15% marked down = $ (64 × 0.85) = $ 54.40 So the new price of the coat is $54.40

questions.question: The sum of the present ages of father and son is 70 years. 7 years ago their age ratio was 5:2. What will be the ratio of their ages after 5 years?
questions.explanation: Let, 7 years ago father age be = 5x years and 7 years ago son age be = 2 x =2 x = 2 x years At present father age be = ( 5 x + 7 ) =(5 x+7) = ( 5 x + 7 ) years At present son age be = ( 2 x + 7 ) =(2 x+7) = ( 2 x + 7 ) years According to the question, 5 x + 7 + 2 x + 7 = 70 ⇒ 7 x = 70 − 14 = 56 ∴ x = 8 5 \mathrm{x}+7+2 \mathrm{x}+7=70 \Rightarrow 7 \mathrm{x}=70-14=56 \therefore \mathrm{x}=8 5 x + 7 + 2 x + 7 = 70 ⇒ 7 x = 70 − 14 = 56 ∴ x = 8 years Father age = 5 × 8 + 7 = 47 =5 \times 8+7=47 = 5 × 8 + 7 = 47 years son age = 2 × 8 + 7 = 23 =2 \times 8+7=23 = 2 × 8 + 7 = 23 years After 5 years father age = 47 + 5 = 52 =47+5=52 = 47 + 5 = 52 years After 5 years son age = ( 23 + 5 ) = 28 =(23+5)=28 = ( 23 + 5 ) = 28 years Ratio = 52 : 28 = 13 : 7 =52: 28=13: 7 = 52 : 28 = 13 : 7

questions.question: A river boat leaves Silver Town and travels upstream to Gold Town at an average speed of 6 kilometers per hour. It returns by the same route at an average speed of 9 kilometers per hour. What is the average speed for the round-trip in kilometers per hour?

Juan sold 1 3 \frac{1}{3} 3 1 ​ of the books in the store during the morning shift. On the evening shift, Marcella sold 3 4 \frac{3}{4} 4 3 ​ of the remaining stock, which left 10 books. How many books were there to begin with?
questions.explanation: Let the total books be x Juan sold be books = x 3 =\frac{x}{3} = 3 x ​ Remaining books = x − x 3 = 2 x 3 =x-\frac{x}{3}=\frac{2 x}{3} = x − 3 x ​ = 3 2 x ​ Marcella sold books = 2 x 3 × 3 4 = x 2 =\frac{2 x}{3} \times \frac{3}{4}=\frac{x}{2} = 3 2 x ​ × 4 3 ​ = 2 x ​ Remaining books = 2 x 3 − x 2 = x 6 =\frac{2 x}{3}-\frac{x}{2}=\frac{x}{6} = 3 2 x ​ − 2 x ​ = 6 x ​ According to the question x 6 = 10 ∴ x = 60 \frac{x}{6}=10 \therefore x=60 6 x ​ = 10 ∴ x = 60

Seats for Mathematics, Physics and Biology in a school are in the ratio 5: 7: 8. There is a proposal to increase these seats by 40%, 50% and 75% respectively. What will be the ratio of increased seats?

Last year Jackie saved 5% of her annual salary. This year, she made 10% more money than last year, and she saved 8% of her salary. The amount saved this year was what percent of the amount she saved last year?
questions.explanation: Assuming Annual Salary of last year = 100 5 % 5 \% 5% Salary Saving last years would give = 100 × 5 100 = 5 =100 \times \frac{5}{100}=5 = 100 × 100 5 ​ = 5 She made 10 % 10 \% 10% more money than year = 100 + 10 = 110 =100+10=110 = 100 + 10 = 110 8 % 8 \% 8% salary saving this year = 8 100 × 110 = 808 =\frac{8}{100} \times 110=808 = 100 8 ​ × 110 = 808 ∴ \therefore ∴ She saved last year = 8.8 5 = 176 % =\frac{8.8}{5}=176 \% = 5 8.8 ​ = 176%

questions.question: Joe needs to deliver a washing machine across town. The company truck can travel 65 mph on the highway, which comprises 13 miles of his trip. For the remaining 12 miles, Joe will average 24 mph. Assuming he does not hit traffic, at what time must Joe leave the warehouse in order to arrive at his destination by 1:30 p.m.
39 persons can repair a road in 12 days, working 5 hours a day. In how many days will 30 persons, working 6 hours a dạy, complete the work?
questions.explanation: 39 Person can repair a road working 5 hours in 12 days. ∴ 1 Person can repair a road working 1 hours in 39 x 12 x 5 days. ∴ 30 Person can repair a road working 1 hours in 39 × 12 × 5 30 × 6 \frac{39 \times 12 \times 5}{30 \times 6} 30 × 6 39 × 12 × 5 ​ = 13 days.
